author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- The Tracer log file now contains entries for the clearing of Event and Source nextTransition times.
- Fixed an ambiguity problem with concurrent EventSetup module calls. Extended the web viewer to handle new information.
- Avoid drawing tracer info if the information is not being displayed within the vertical constraints of the window.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and tests with various log files succeeded.
title: Added between Event callbacks to Tracer log file
